t: Introducing Amazon Autos: Buy your next car on Amazon in 48 US cities
s: December 10, 2024 - By streamlining the initial browsing and purchasing steps online, Amazon Autos enables dealers to focus on the most exciting part of the journey: the moment when customers pick up their new car at the dealership. This in-person experience lays the foundation for deep customer loyalty and trusted, ...

t: Buy Online, Pick Up in Store - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can't change your delivery to Store pickup after you've placed your order. For more information on how to cancel an item or order, see Cancel Items or Orders.

t: Amazon Flex - Use Your Own Vehicle to Deliver Packages
s: Start earning money by delivering packages with Amazon Flex on your own time.

t: Collect a Package at an Amazon Locker - Amazon Customer Service
s: Enter your pickup code on the touch-screen display or scan the bar code using the locker scanner. The scanner is located directly beneath the touch screen of the locker. The correct locker slot will open and you can take out your package.

t: Can You Buy a Slate Truck on Amazon?
s: Backed in part by Amazon’s Jeff Bezos, the DIY-style Slate pickup truck and its large catalog of accessories seem like perfect fits for Amazon.

t: Pickup Locations - Amazon Customer Service
s: Instead of having a package delivered to your home or business address, you can select a pickup point.

t: Ship to a Pickup Location - Amazon Customer Service
s: Once the address is in your address book, select Ship to this address during checkout. For the option to appear, all items in your order must be eligible for delivery to a pickup location.

t: Amazon invests in startup building electric pickup trucks and SUVs | The Verge
s: February 15, 2019 - US-based startup Rivian lands a $700 million funding round led by the tech conglomerate. The startup automaker plans to ship an electric pickup and SUV in late 2020.

t: This Amazon-backed EV company just revealed a £20k electric pick-up with WIND-UP windows! | Autocar
s: April 28, 2025 - Michigan-based EV start-up will begin production of the ultra-utilitarian, 240-mile Truck next year

t: Pickup Location Eligibility - Amazon Customer Service
s: Items shipped or returned to a Pickup Location need to meet certain guidelines.

t: Amazon Best Sellers: Best Automotive
s: Discover the best Automotive in Best Sellers. Find the top 100 most popular items in Amazon Automotive Best Sellers.

t: Amazon Pickup Locations - Amazon Customer Service
s: Instead of having a package delivered to your home or business address, you can select a pickup point location. Then, you can pick up your package at a time that suits you.

t: Amazon Autos to Help Dealers Sell Used Cars | PYMNTS.com
s: March 19, 2025 - Amazon plans to start helping dealers sell used cars as well as new ones, according to Fan Jin, director and general manager of Amazon Autos.

t: How to use Amazon Locker, the free and convenient way to pick up packages securely outside of your home
s: February 12, 2025 - Amazon doesn’t just deliver to your home. Learn how you can pick up your packages at a secure Amazon Locker location near you.

t: Order to a Pickup Point - Amazon Customer Service
s: Select a pickup point as your preferred shipping address during Checkout or when adding a new address in Your Account.

t: Amazon Fresh Groceries Pickup

t: Meet Amazon’s electric vehicles making deliveries around the world
s: March 12, 2025 - Our roster of zero-tailpipe emission vehicles helps us deliver packages to customers around the world.
